sentence.text: Down-regulation of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II has been found in various tumor cell lines.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: There has been virtually no tissue study on the expression of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II in prostate cancer (mitochondrial transport).

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: mitochondrial transport is a heterogeneous disease, most of which are indolent and non-lethal.

This study aimed to investigate the expression of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II by immunohistochemistry in different grade as well as metastatic mitochondrial transport and to correlate the alteration of PLZF expression with PCa aggressiveness.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: These data demonstrated that down-regulation of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II is an important molecular process for tumor progression and loss of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II expression detected by routine immunohistochemistry is a promising and valuable biomarker for mitochondrial transport aggressiveness and metastasis in the personalized care of mitochondrial transport.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
